summary: This replaces the statue of Talos in Whiterun with one I created from the \"Better Males\" body meshes. Beware, he\'s now naked and hard! (Or not if you choose the flaccid version.)
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i1300.photobucket.com/albums/ag92/Grimoa/almightytalos.jpg[/img]


[size=4]>> What does it do?[/size]
It replaces the statue of Talos in Whiterun with one I created from the \"Better Males\" body meshes. Beware, he\'s now naked and hard!
Update (v1.1): I added a flaccid version some of you have asked for.
aoki spend quite some time troubleshooting the CTD issue and finally found the bug! Thank you so much! Anyone having problems before should try the new version.

[size=4]>> Install Instructions[/size]
Unpack the archive and merge with Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

to uninstall remove
Data\\Textures\\clutter\\gri_talostatue
Data\\Meshes\\clutter\\statues\\statuetalos01.nif

or use NMM!


[size=4]>> Compatible with[/size]
anything. Unless it changes the very same statue. Duh.
If you used a HD texture replacer for the old statue (please tell me where to find it!) you will still see it on the unchanged parts of the statue.


[size=4]>> Why?[/size]
:D
Because ratoboran\'s mod made me laugh so hard. (Get it here: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26607]Naked Talos[/url])
Because - as pointed out in the comments for ratoboran\'s mod - Heimskr\'s prayers suddenly make sense!
Because I couldn\'t stop thinking how awesome Talos would look with the erect body replacer.
Uhm yeah, no further reasons.


[size=4]>> Legal stuff[/size]
Please do not redistribute this file!
Contact me if you whish to use any parts of this mod.


[size=4]>> Software used[/size]
Blender
Nifskope
Gimp


[size=4]>> Credits[/size]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4710697]ratoboran[/url] for the idea
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/513855]aoki[/url] for help with bugfixing
Chris57 and FavoredSoul for the nude male meshes + textures from [url=(http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488]Better Males[/url]
Bethseda for Skyrim
AlienSlof because there is nothing wrong with a little glorification of male anatomy in video games!
author: Grimoa
